data.title: CoDA.org
data.meta_description: Recovery program for codependence. Find a local or online meeting. If you desire healthy & loving relationships CoDA can help.
data.text:
Somewhere along the line, we learned to doubt our perception, discount our feelings, and overlook our needs. We looked to others to tell us what to think, feel, and behave. Other people supplied us with information about who we were and should be. It became more important to be compliant or avoidant rather than to be authentic, and we adopted rigid beliefs about what “should be.” We believed that if we could just “get it right,” things would be okay. When we “got it wrong,” our sense of security and self-worth evaporated.

We find by working the Steps and Traditions, we find the strength to be that which God intended, Precious & Free, with healthy, loving relationships. We find the Promises coming true, one day at a time.

Twelve Steps

Twelve Traditions

Twelve Promises

Twelve Service Concepts

We find by working the Steps and Traditions, we find the strength to be that which God intended, Precious & Free, with healthy, loving relationships. We find the Promises coming true, one day at a time.

Twelve Steps

Twelve Traditions

Twelve Promises

Twelve Service Concepts

When you find your first meeting, and walk in the door, you will find a safe place, where all are welcome. There is only one requirement to join; a desire for healthy and loving relationships. Your first meeting will introduce you to The Twelve Steps, The Twelve Traditions, The Promises and more. These are the foundation of our program, and you will come to find great comfort in them, one day at a time as you walk the path of recovery from codependence.
